channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Large Pothole - Woolwich Road, 20th February
item.description:
Woolwich Road westbound, just before the petrol station, has one very large pothole along with multiple additional potholes that are rapidly worsening along the same stretch of carriageway. With cordoned-off construction on one side and a pavement on the other, drivers have little room to avoid the damage and the potholes are increasing in size by the day. This section of road has effectively become a hazard zone and requires immediate inspection and urgent repair.
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Woolwich Road, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road is riddled with potholes, 20th February

item.title: Furniture and rubbish left in the corner of the estate, 19th February
item.description:
Fly tipping occurs often in this spot. CCTV cameras are needed. This time they left lots of furniture and rubbish dumped in this area. It’s ridiculous they managed to do this during the day and no one noticed it. It’s at the entrance to the building so not safe for people living here.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Mawbey Road, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 5 serious potholes at least 60 mm deep, 19th February
item.description:
There are 5 very serious potholes left on this section whilst tens of thousands have been spent on a raised table a few yards. Staggering even if it’s from a different budget. They need urgent repair.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Buxted Road, Friern Barnet, Greater London

item.title: Street lamp not working. No light in alley, 19th February
item.description:
I know this has been reported but that was many days and nights ago and nothing has been done... As reported already.this is dangerous. There is no light in the alley at all. The single light is not working. Please resolve ASAP. Residents should not have to carry a torch!!!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Eastcote, Crofton, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Park Hall Road SE21 at Martell Road junction o, 19th February
item.description:
Park Hall Road SE21 at Martell Road junction on the side of “Park Court” green plastic Lambeth road sweeper’s road sweeping bin bag graffiti tagged. Please forward fixmystreet.com link to your contractor for picture and Google Streetview link: https://www.google.com/maps/@51.4350872,-0.0950513,3a,49.8y,183.02h,86.5t/data=!3m7!1e1!3m5!1sjR55-fbc6A8CU4SxTETH2Q!2e0!6shttps:%2F%2Fstreetviewpixels-pa.googleapis.com%2Fv1%2Fthumbnail%3Fcb_client%3Dmaps_sv.tactile%26w%3D900%26h%3D600%26pitch%3D3.500770034640354%26panoid%3DjR55-fbc6A8CU4SxTETH2Q%26yaw%3D183.02323934704242!7i16384!8i8192?authuser=0&entry=ttu&g_ep=EgoyMDI2MDIxNy4wIKXMDSoASAFQAw%3D%3D
